scripts.wasm-mock-web-client:dev: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --out-dir ../packages/wasm-mock-web-client --no-opt wasm-mock-web-client && cd packages/wasm-mock-web-client && rm .gitignore
scripts.wasm-mock-web-client:build: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --out-dir ../packages/wasm-mock-web-client --release wasm-mock-web-client && cd packages/wasm-mock-web-client && rm .gitignore && pnpm add dexie@4.0.8
